optCover 
 public static SourceSpan optCover(SourceSpan optA,
                                   SourceSpan optB)
Returns a new SourceSpan that covers the original two. Either input may be null, as may the output. If either input is null, the result is the other one. If the two don't have the same Url, the result is null. Finally, the result describes the minimal span that includes both the originals.
